root.name: EyeToy: Play
root.description: OverviewEyeToy: Play was the first game developed for the EyeToy on the Playstation 2. The game is actually a collection of mini-games. In each game, the EyeToy detects the player's motions and the player is allowed to manipulate objects on screen or control other processes.
